name: Worker Bee
description:
Spring has started and with that bees have started their work!

Worker bee is a  casual adventure game where you play as a worker bee which has to collect as much pollen as possible. 

Controls:

WASD - move

Space - collect pollen, empty pollen

F - go inside the hive

Escape - pause

Game assets by: Kenney.

Music by: Jordan Ottesen (jottesen.itch.io)

This game was submitted to the #GreatSpringGameJam2021
